com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.css3

Class Opacity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<Opacity>
      • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.css3.Opacity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CssProperty, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class Opacity
extends AbstractCssProperty<Opacity>
     opacity: number|initial|inherit;

 The opacity property sets the opacity level for an element.

 The opacity-level describes the transparency-level, where 1 is not transparant at all, 0.5 is 50% see-through, and 0 is completely transparent.
 Default value:  1
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS3
 JavaScript syntax:      object.style.opacity="0.5"
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    WFF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
